title: Rely
subtitle: The $t(common:appName.full)
agree: By continuing, you agree to the
terms: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

wallet.title: Choose your Wallet Setup
wallet.description: Start Fresh or Bring an Existing Wallet

import.title: Import from Seed
import.description:
Enter your 12, 15, 18, 21, 24 words seed phrase. 
 Separate each word with a single space.

password.title: Password
password.hint: Your password will not be stored anywhere but your device. You will need this password to access your wallet.

mnemonic.title: Secret Recovery Phrase
mnemonic.description:
Write down the secret words in order. 
 This is the only way to recover your wallet.

biometrics.title: Enable {{biometryType}}
biometrics.description: Enable {{biometryType}} authentication to protect your wallet and quickly access your wallet.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.subtitle: Your Wallet is Ready to Roll
getStarted.description: Get started on your journey by exploring the app.
